name: Fan Wu 0006
content: Dr. Fan Wu Fan Wu Home Biography Publications Professional Activities Projects Teaching Research Group Ph.D., Professor, and Department Head Department of Computer Science and Engineering Shanghai Jiao Tong University 3-537 SEIEE Building 800 Dongchuan Road Shanghai 200240, P.R. China Email: fwu@cs.sjtu.edu.cn Phone: +86-21-34206002 RECRUITING I am looking for well motivated students to work on cutting-edge research projects. Both undergraduate and graduate students are welcome! NEWS Mar. 2022 Our paper "Walle: A Device-Cloud Collaborative Engineering System in Alibaba for Industrial-Strength Machine Learning Tasks" is accepted to USENIX OSDI 2022. Aug. 2021 Our paper "SMART: Screen-based Gesture Recognition on Commodity Mobile Devices" is accepted to ACM MobiCom 2021. May 2021 Two papers are accepted to ACM SIGKDD 2021, including "We Know What You Want: An Advertising Strategy Recommender System for Online Advertising" and "NeuralAuction: End-to-End Learning of Auction Mechanisms for E-Commerce Advertising". Apr. 2021 Our paper "Service Provisioning for UAV-Enabled Mobile Edge Computing" is accepted to IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (JSAC). Feb. 2021 Our paper "Strategy-Proof Online Mechanisms for Weighted AoI Minimization in Edge Computing" is accepted to IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (JSAC). Dec. 2020 Our paper "Robust Offloading Scheduling for Mobile Edge Computing" is accepted to IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC). Oct. 2020 Our paper "Toward Verifiable and Privacy Preserving Machine Learning Prediction" is accepted to IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing (TDSC). Oct. 2020 Our paper "On Designing Strategy-Proof Budget Feasible Online Mechanism for Mobile Crowdsensing with Time-Discounting Values" is accepted to IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC). Sept. 2020 Our paper "From Server-Based to Client-Based Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey" is accepted to ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR). Aug. 2020 Our paper "Billion-Scale Federated Learning on Mobile Clients: A Submodel Design with Tunable Privacy" is accepted to ACM MobiCom 2020. RESEARCH INTERESTS Mobile Computing and Intelligence, e.g., On-Device Machine Learning and Mobile Crowdsensing Algorithmic Network Economics, e.g., Game-Theoretic Incentives and Online Ad Exchange Data Management, e.g., Safe Data Sharing, Data Pricing, and Data Protection Network Resource Management, e.g., Wireless Spectrum Management and Bandwidth Management Wireless Networking, e.g., Mobile Networking, Ad Hoc Networking, and Wireless Mesh Networking Security, e.g., Privacy Preservation Distributed Computing, e.g., Peer-to-Peer Computing SELECTED PUBLICATIONS Renjie Gu, Chaoyue Niu, Fan Wu, Guihai Chen, Chun Hu, Chengfei Lyu, and Zhihua Wu, From Server-Based to Client-Based Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey, to appear in ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR), 2020. (Corresponding Author) Chaoyue Niu, Fan Wu, Shaojie Tang, Lifeng Hua, Rongfei Jia, Chengfei Lv, Zhihua Wu, and Guihai Chen, Billion-Scale Federated Learning on Mobile Clients: A Submodel Design with Tunable Privacy, in Proceedings of the 26th Annual ACM International Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking (MobiCom), online, Sept. 21-25, 2020. (Corresponding Author) Chaoyue Niu, Zhenzhe Zheng, Shaojie Tang, Fan Wu, and Guihai Chen, Online Pricing with Reserve Price Constraint for Personal Data Markets, to appear in IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE), 2020. (Corresponding Author) Fan Wu, Shuo Yang, Zhenzhe Zheng, Shaojie Tang, and Guihai Chen, Fine-Grained User Profiling for Personalized Task Matching in Mobile Crowdsensing, to appear in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC), 2020. (Corresponding Author) Chaoyue Niu, Zhenzhe Zheng, Shaojie Tang, Xiaofeng Gao, and Fan Wu, Making Big Money from Small Sensors: Trading Time-Series Data under Pufferfish Privacy, in Proceedings of the 38th Annual IEEE International Conference on Computer Communications (INFOCOM), Paris, France, Apr. 29-May 2, 2019. (Corresponding Author) Zhenzhe Zheng, Yanqing Peng, Fan Wu, Shaojie Tang, and Guihai Chen, ARETE: On Designing Joint Online Pricing and Reward Sharing Mechanisms for Mobile Data Markets, to appear in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC).
